definitions.definition: Usually preceded by the : alternative letter-case form of Orient ( “ a region or a part of the world to the east of a certain place ; countries of Asia , the East (especially East Asia ) ” ) [from 14th c.]

main_definition: Usually preceded by the : alternative letter-case form of Orient ( “ a region or a part of the world to the east of a certain place ; countries of Asia , the East (especially East Asia ) ” ) [from 14th c.]

definitions.definition: The part of the horizon where the sun first appears in the morning ; the east .
A pearl originating from the Indian region, reputed to be of great brilliance ; ( by extension ) any pearl of particular beauty and value .
The brilliance or colour of a high-quality pearl.

main_definition: The part of the horizon where the sun first appears in the morning ; the east .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A pearl originating from the Indian region, reputed to be of great brilliance ; ( by extension ) any pearl of particular beauty and value . [19th c.]
( by extension ) The brilliance or colour of a high-quality pearl.
